WHO WE ARE:

We want to transform how people interact with technology using the original interface: the human hand. Over the last two years, we’ve shipped almost half a million motion-tracking controllers to developers and consumers around the world, opening up new possibilities for a platform beyond the screen – from music and gaming to the next generation of VR/AR interfaces.
